message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $9000. I believe this is a great opportunity for you to get a high-quality product at a competitive price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $8000. I believe this is a fair price that balances my needs with your expectations.
